title: Charles Eisenstein, Sensemaker Q&A
description:
Charles Eisenstein is one of the world's most interesting thinkers on the nexus between systems change, spirituality and transformation.

The author of books including 'The More Beautiful World Our Hearts Know is Possible', he was the star of a recent Rebel Wisdom film 'An Epidemic of Control': https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NK8C_rCz1yw&t=2096s

This was a Q&A for Rebel Wisdom Sensemakers. To join future sessions, consider becoming a member: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans
